summary: VEHICLE SHIFTS TO NEUTRAL WHILE DRIVING AND YOU HAVE TO PULL OVER AND SHIFT IT INTO PARK TO START GOING AGAIN. HAPPENS RANDOMLY, SOMETIMES THE DASH WILL SAY AWD SYSTEM NEEDS SERVIC. WEVE TAKEN IT INTO THE SHOP MULTIPLE TIMES WITH NO RESOLUTION. CONCERNED ABOUT DIVERS SAFETY!  WE BOUGHT THIS CAR USED LAST YEAR (2018) AND HAVE STARTED HAVING TROUBLE ABOUT 2 WEEKS LATER. PRETTY SURE THE PREVIOUS OWNERS TRADED IT IN FOR THIS REASON.
